price: ከመጽሐፉም ሰዎች ከመሞቱ በፊት በእርሱ (በዒሳ) በእርግጥ የሚያምን እንጅ (አንድም) የለም፡፡ በትንሣኤም ቀን በነሱ ላይ መስካሪ ይኾናል፡፡
arabic: وَإِن مِّنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِلَّا لَيُؤۡمِنَنَّ بِهِۦ قَبۡلَ مَوۡتِهِۦۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ يَكُونُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ شَهِيدٗا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in min ahli al-kitābi illā layu'minanna bihi qabla mawtihi wayawma al-qiyāmati yakūnu ʿalayhim shahīdan
